column5: There's been many discussions here on trailering and tongue weight. I saw this and found it interesting...  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qkx46Js_19M
Very interesting..... and very real. My old boat towed like the version without the tongue weight. It was extremely difficult to correct. I had to shift the batteries forward for towing.
You can move your boat forward/back by 3 cm and greatly affect your weight distribution. Just un bolt your winch mast and move in appropriate direction.
http://www.popularmechanics.com/cars/a23204/uhaul-demonstration-packing-trailers-correctly/  The same video with an explanation.
